VaruthapadathaValibarSangam
**DvDScR/ X265 / AAC / 2/3 CD**


Special Notes: Experimental Release

This is an HEVC encode, the future in Video Coding Playable only on PC/MAC.

- This is an HEVC encode (High Efficiency Video Coding).
HEVC aka H265 is the Futur in Encoding technology. 
This codec will enable 4K and 8K movie experience for upto 8192 x 4320 pixels. 
It's better than x264/H264 with half the bitrate thus half the file size. 


- For now you will only be to play this by using DIVX 10 player. 
You can download it freely from their web site. 

You can download it for free from DivX :
Code  Code:
DivX 10 - HEVC for the Masses | DivX.com

- No screenshot here because I havent found any good solution to take SS from the HEVC player. 
So plz check included sample if you want to get convinced by the quality & efficiency of this next generation encoder.
